column1: frank, as always, admired his height, very <entity>.
but she had inherited her father's <entity> height, his lankiness.
being <entity> did add more frustrations to their lives than perceived advantages.

but i'm loving my height now cause <entity> girls do make a more lasting impression.

almost the same height since she was <entity>, which made it even more like they were together.
